channel.title: Sandy Graham on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Sandy Graham on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Waterbaby Arts
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan RF - Ruth Foster MG - Maureen Graham SG - Sandy Graham MM On this episode on Iriss.fm we hear about an arts organisation called Waterbaby Arts and we’re going to be hearing from two of the dancers that take part. It’s Maureen Graham and Sandy Graham but first up we’re going to speak to Ruth Foster, Ruth Foster is the tutor of (… unclear) Dance baby.
